channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA
channel.description: Translated Alerts from Air Alert UA

item.title: 🔴 06:06 Air anxiety in the Kherson Oblast follow the following messages.
item.description: 🔴 06:06 Air anxiety in the Kherson Oblast follow the following messages.#Kherson_ex This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.

item.title: 🟠 05:49 Attention !!! Threat of use of managed aviation bombs (cabin).
